      • parse

        public static Polynomial parse(java.lang.String str)
        Creates a new Polynomial from a string representation. If the String is invalid a default Polynomial (0x^1) is returned
        Parameters:
        str - String representation of a Polynomial
        Returns:
        A new Polynomial that matches the string
